overview:
Devin is currently Founder and CEO of GroupRaise.com, a site that connects local groups with restaurants who care.

Devin has a background of co-founding, Baptiste & Allan Consulting, a Houston based consulting firm focused on organizational development and technology implementation for businesses and nonprofits. He is Founder and Executive Director of Reach Out, a non-profit focused on youth executive education hosting fundraising events in support of the Muscular Dystrophy Association and development efforts in Africa.
